document_name: IPRCC II Prodoc signed final version 08.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Through the project, the International Poverty Reduction Center in China's institutional development will be further strengthened and South-South cooperation for poverty reduction of other developing countries promoted.

project_descr: Strengthening the capacity of the International Poverty Reduction Center in China for South-South Cooperation
project_title: Srengthen the Capacity of Int'l Poverty Reduction Center
